overview:
Luke Giuliani is passionate about using technology to make the world a better place, in particular working with social enterprises and startups. His background is predominantly in web technologies but has also worked in process, mechanical and electrical engineering.

Luke has worked all around the world providing strategic, process and web consultancy for organisations like RMIT, Victorian State Government, City of Melbourne, Dulux and ZLB (CSL Bioplasma), as well as startups and community organisations including OurSay, Future Spark, Clarity Engine and Right Now. His involvement in projects is about making complicated matters simple and finding easier ways for people to accomplish what they want to achieve.

In his spare time, Luke enjoys good coffee, exhausting games of squash, long rides and bad sci-fi.
